Title: Where Nothing Stays Buried
Writer: Julie Plec (created by), Carina Adly MacKenzie, Christopher Hollier, Declan De Barra (executive story editor), Ashley Lyle (executive story editor), Bart Nickerson (executive story editor), Michael Russo (executive story editor), Carina Adly MacKenzie (story editor), L.J. Smith (based in part on the character Klaus from "The Vampire Diaries" novels by)
Actors: Joseph Morgan, Daniel Gillies, Phoebe Tonkin, Charles Michael Davis
Plot: In the wake of a ruthless plan that has left their family shattered, Klaus, Elijah and Freya desperately search for a way to take down Lucien once and for all. However, their efforts are ...
